gyldighed.name: Validhoures
gyldighed.text: Forecast, valid to the 12. August 06 UTC.. Issued at 6.45 UTC..

oversigt.name: Synoptic situation
oversigt.text: A low, 1004 hPa, southeast of the Baffin Iceland, is almost stationary, and an associated front with light rain over the southwest- and southern waters, is moving towards north. Locally fog in all waters.

udsigtfordaneborg.name: Forecast for Daneborg
udsigtfordaneborg.text: North 1 to 6 m/s. And in northwestern part variable below 5 m/s. Very poor to good visibility. Around noon, this evening and this night north 7 to 12 m/s. Very poor visibility.

wavesdaneborg.name: Waves Daneborg
wavesdaneborg.text: Significant wave height: 1,5 m. Swells: 1 m.

icedaneborg.name: Ice_Daneborg
icedaneborg.text: Strips and patches of Old ice and thick first-year ice in the western and northern part. Few icebergs and growlers throughout the area.

udsigtforkangikajik.name: Forecast for Kangikajik
udsigtforkangikajik.text: North 1 to 6 m/s. And in southwestern part variable below 5 m/s. Poor to good visibility. Around noon southwest 1 to 6 m/s. Good visibility. This evening and this night northwest 6 to 11 m/s. Good visibility.

waveskangikajik.name: Waves Kangikajik
waveskangikajik.text: Significant wave height: 1,5 m. Swells: 1 m.

icekangikajik.name: Ice_Kangikajik
icekangikajik.text: Strips and patches of Old ice and thick first-year ice in the western and southern part. Scattered icebergs and growlers in the western part along the coast, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtforaputiteeq.name: Forecast for Aputiteeq
udsigtforaputiteeq.text: In western part northeast 4 to 9 m/s. And in eastern part west 6 to 11 m/s. Good visibility. Around noon in western part southwest 2 to 7 m/s. And in eastern part north 3 to 8 m/s. Good visibility. This evening southwest 3 to 8 m/s. And in northeastern part north 2 to 7 m/s. Good visibility. This night southwest 3 to 8 m/s. Very poor visibility.

wavesaputiteeq.name: Waves Aputiteeq
wavesaputiteeq.text: Significant wave height: 1,5 m. Swells: 1,5 m.

iceaputiteeq.name: Ice_Aputiteeq
iceaputiteeq.text: Strips and patches of Old ice and thick first-year ice in the northern part and in the western part along the coast. Scattered icebergs and growlers in the western part along the coast, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtforkulusuk.name: Forecast for Kulusuk
udsigtforkulusuk.text: Southwest 4 to 9 m/s. And in northwestern part northeast 3 to 8 m/s. Good visibility. Around noon in western part north 3 to 8 m/s. And in eastern part west 1 to 6 m/s. Good visibility. This evening and this night southwest 3 to 8 m/s. Good visibility.

waveskulusuk.name: Waves Kulusuk
waveskulusuk.text: Significant wave height: 1,5 m. Swells: 1,5 m.

icekulusuk.name: Ice_Kulusuk
icekulusuk.text: Old ice in the northwestern part. Many icebergs and growlers in the western part, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtfortimmiarmiut.name: Forecast for Timmiarmiut
udsigtfortimmiarmiut.text: South 5 to 10 m/s. Very poor visibility. Around noon and this evening in western part north 4 to 9 m/s. And in eastern part south 3 to 8 m/s. Poor to moderate visibility. This night variable below 5 m/s. Poor visibility.

wavestimmiarmiut.name: Waves Timmiarmiut
wavestimmiarmiut.text: Significant wave height: 2 m. Swells: 1,5 m.

icetimmiarmiut.name: Ice_Timmiarmiut
icetimmiarmiut.text: Few areas with old ice in the westernmost part. Scattered icebergs and growlers in the western part along the coast, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtfornunapisuatakangia.name: Forecast for Nunap Isuata Kangia
udsigtfornunapisuatakangia.text: Southwest 4 to 9 m/s. Very poor visibility. This evening in western part northeast 1 to 6 m/s. And in eastern part variable below 5 m/s. Very poor visibility. This night northeast 1 to 6 m/s. Very poor visibility.

waveskangia.name: Waves Nunap Isuata Kangia
waveskangia.text: Significant wave height: 1,5 m. Swells: 1,5 m.

icenunapisuatakangia.name: Ice_Nunapisuatakangia
icenunapisuatakangia.text: Scattered icebergs and growlers in the northwestern part, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtfornunapisuatakitaa.name: Forecast for Nunap Isuata Kitaa
udsigtfornunapisuatakitaa.text: Variable below 5 m/s. Very poor visibility. This evening and this night northeast 2 to 7 m/s. Very poor visibility.

waveskitaa.name: Waves Isuata Kitaa
waveskitaa.text: Significant wave height: 1,5 m. Swells: 1,5 m.

icenunapisuatakitaa.name: Ice_Nunapisuatakitaa
icenunapisuatakitaa.text: Many icebergs and growlers in the northern part, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtfornunarsuit.name: Forecast for Nunarsuit
udsigtfornunarsuit.text: Variable below 5 m/s. Very poor visibility.

wavesnunarsuit.name: Waves Nunarsuit
wavesnunarsuit.text: Significant wave height: 1,5 m. Swells: 1,5 m.

icenunarsuit.name: Ice_Nunarsuit
icenunarsuit.text: Many icebergs and growlers in the eastern part, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtfornarsalik.name: Forecast for Narsalik
udsigtfornarsalik.text: Southeast 2 to 7 m/s. Very poor visibility. Around noon and this evening southeast 2 to 7 m/s. And in southeastern part variable below 5 m/s. Very poor visibility. This night variable below 5 m/s. Very poor visibility.

wavesnarsalik.name: Waves Narsalik
wavesnarsalik.text: Significant wave height: 1,5 m. Swells: 1,5 m.

udsigtformeqquitsoq.name: Forecast for Meqquitsoq
udsigtformeqquitsoq.text: Southeast 5 to 10 m/s. Very poor visibility.

wavesmeqquitsoq.name: Waves Meqquitsoq
wavesmeqquitsoq.text: Significant wave height: 2 m. Swells: 1,5 m.

udsigtforattu.name: Forecast for Attu
udsigtforattu.text: Southeast 5 to 10 m/s. Poor visibility. This night north 1 to 6 m/s. Very poor visibility.

wavesattu.name: Waves Attu
wavesattu.text: Significant wave height: 2 m. Swells: 2 m.

udsigtforuiffaq.name: Forecast for Uiffaq
udsigtforuiffaq.text: Southeast 2 to 7 m/s. Poor visibility. Around noon southeast 1 to 6 m/s. And in southeastern part variable below 5 m/s. Very poor to good visibility. This evening in western part variable below 5 m/s. And in eastern part northwest 1 to 6 m/s. Very poor to poor visibility. This night northwest 1 to 6 m/s. Very poor visibility.

wavesuiffaq.name: Waves Uiffaq
wavesuiffaq.text: Significant wave height: 1,5 m. Swells: 1,5 m.

iceuiffaq.name: Ice_Uiffaq
iceuiffaq.text: Many icebergs and growlers in the eastern part, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtforqimusseriarsuaq.name: Forecast for Qimusseriarsuaq
udsigtforqimusseriarsuaq.text: South 4 to 9 m/s. Poor visibility. Around noon and this evening east 3 to 8 m/s. And in southwestern part southwest 2 to 7 m/s. Moderate to good visibility. This night in western part south 2 to 7 m/s. And in eastern part east 2 to 7 m/s. Poor visibility.

wavesqimusseriarsuaq.name: Waves Qimusseriarsuaq
wavesqimusseriarsuaq.text: Significant wave height: 1 m. Swells: 1 m.

iceqimusseriarsuaq.name: Ice_Qimusseriarsuaq
iceqimusseriarsuaq.text: Thick first-year ice in the northeasternmost part along the coast. Many icebergs and growlers in the eastern part along the coast, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

waveskiatak.name: Waves Kiatak
waveskiatak.text: Significant wave height: 1,5 m. Swells: 1 m.

icekiatak.name: Ice_Kiatak
icekiatak.text: Old ice and thick first-year ice in the northernmost part. Scattered icebergs and growlers throughout the area.
